data.title: Jack Williams Tire Selects BizTech and Oracle Hyperion to Optimize Financial Operations and Support Future Expansion Strategies
data.meta_description: Jack Williams Tire (JWT), a third generation family-owned retailer and wholesaler of tires and automotive services selects Business Technology Services (BizTech) to install and deploy Oracle Hyperion Essbase.
data.text:
Jack Williams Tire (JWT), a third generation family-owned retailer and wholesaler of tires and automotive services selects Business Technology Services (BizTech) to install and deploy Oracle Hyperion Essbase. The Oracle Hyperion implementation will replace the company's current vertical market software application providing a more information rich and centralized reporting infrastructure.

Oracle Hyperion Essbase is regarded as an industry-leading online analytical processing (OLAP) server. Designed for business users, Oracle Hyperion Essbase most notably supports: financial forecasting, scenario planning and what-Â¬if modeling.

Jack Williams Tire is anticipating a significant benefit from Oracle Hyperion's modern, centralized reporting infrastructure to help it accelerate data insights to help drive its expanding business forward. "We expect to drastically reduce manual data extraction efforts from multiple data sources and increase financial and operational visibility throughout all 39 Jack Williams Tire locations", said Michael Mellody, Corporate Controller. "With this increased visibility we will be better able to plan and forecast with multiple "what if" scenarios so we can react quickly to changes in the market."

With BizTech's proven implementation methodology, Jack Williams Tire will capitalize on a process driven foundation for a successful implementation. BizTech's Oracle Hyperion solutions experts bring extensive Oracle Hyperion knowledge and experience, as well as a comprehensive understanding of financial and management reporting.

About Jack Williams Tire (JWT)

Established in 1929, by Jack Williams, Sr. in Kingston, PA, Jack Williams Tire Company, Inc. is a third-generation, family-owned and operated business that includes 28 retail stores, 11 Wholesale Centers, and employs over 550 people. Since opening their doors, they have been operating each of their Jack Williams Tire locations with the 'Williams Way" in mind. The 'Williams Way' is their Commitment to go above and beyond customers' expectations and to provide the greatest value possible. This commitment means that they conduct their business with honesty and integrity, while providing friendly and professional service! Jack Williams Tire is the 45th largest independent tire dealer and one of the largest tire wholesalers, actively serving over 5,000 accounts and delivering to multiple states in the Northeast United States.
